titles.title: Supreme Court Tenure Establishment and Retirement Modernization Act of 2022
Supreme Court Tenure Establishment and Retirement Modernization Act of 2022

A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to provide for the duration of active service of the Chief Justice of the United States and associate justices of the Supreme Court of the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Supreme Court Tenure Establishment and Retirement Modernization Act of 2022
This bill sets an 18-year term limit for Supreme Court Justices.
